projects.title: Warm Dark Matter Constraints
projects.subtitle: Bayesian Analysis of Milky Way Satellite Data
projects.description: Advanced constraints on Warm Dark Matter particle mass to >4 keV/c² through Bayesian statistical analysis of Milky Way satellite galaxy data, doubling previous research bounds.
projects.extendedDescription: Conducted comprehensive Bayesian statistical analysis of Milky Way satellite galaxy data using high-performance Python framework with Monte Carlo integration. Optimized computational bottlenecks achieving 100x runtime improvement over previous implementations. Authored detailed research methods summary with full GitHub reproducibility for upcoming publication.
projects.impact: Advanced particle mass constraints to >4 keV/c², doubling previous research bounds with 100x performance improvement
